Sequence Information.Source: amino acid SUBSTITUTION, scorpion defensin, animal-derived, natural derivatives

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (91.89%) toBmKDfsin4C=G: 16%; R: 14%, S: 11%.Chemical modification: 3 disulfide bonds.Activity: active against S. aureus ATCC6538 or AB94004 (MIC 16 uM or NA), S.epidermidis AB208187 or AB208188 (NA), and E.coli (NA). NA: no activity.
Literature Information.Author: Yang X, Zhang H, Zuo Z, Qin C, Liu Y, Cao Z, Wu Y.2024
Literature Information.Reference: Int J Biol Macromol. 2024 Oct 31:137151. doi: 10.1016/j.ijbiomac.2024.137151.PubMed
Literature Information.Title: Novel structural determinants and bacterial death-related regulatory effects of the scorpion defensin BmKDfsin4 against gram-positive bacteria
